title: How to Make a Layered Chocolate and Cream Biscuit

steps.headline: Get one tea biscuit and spread chocolate spread on one side of it.
steps.description: Make sure you put two coatings of spread on the one side so it's pretty thick.

steps.headline: Squirt a blob of cream that fits in the middle of the biscuit and so it doesn't come too much out the sides.
Sprinkle the cream with the cocoa or hot chocolate powder.
Get the another biscuit and spread a thick coating of the chocolate spread on both sides.
Push that biscuit on top of the cream and the other biscuit.
Squirt a blob of cream on the biscuit at the top.
Then get the last biscuit, and spread it with chocolate spread.
Push it down on the other two, so it's like a triple decker biscuit burger.

text: Get one tea biscuit and spread chocolate spread on one side of it. Make sure you put two coatings of spread on the one side so it's pretty thick. Squirt a blob of cream that fits in the middle of the biscuit and so it doesn't come too much out the sides.  Sprinkle the cream with the cocoa or hot chocolate powder.  Get the another biscuit and spread a thick coating of the chocolate spread on both sides.  Push that biscuit on top of the cream and the other biscuit.  Squirt a blob of cream on the biscuit at the top.  And sprinkle with the powder.  Then get the last biscuit, and spread it with chocolate spread.  Push it down on the other two, so it's like a triple decker biscuit burger.  Enjoy this delicious snack!  Finished.
